I am trying to build the following dockerfile for the https://github.com/CVHub520/X-AnyLabeling.git repository. It should install any necessary dependencies and then run tests to confirm that installation succeeded:
# Use an official Python runtime as a parent image
FROM python:3.8-slim

# Set the working directory in the container to /app
WORKDIR /app

# Copy the current directory contents into the container at /app
COPY . /app/

# Install system dependencies
RUN apt-get update && \
    apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends gcc && \
    rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*

# Install Python dependencies
RUN pip install --upgrade pip && \
    pip install -r requirements.txt && \
    pip install -r requirements-dev.txt && \
    pip install -r requirements-gpu.txt

# Run the test suite to verify installation
RUN python -m unittest discover -s tests
